name: Flying Fortress SKY FIRE
description:

Once per turn, you can send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard to destroy 1 card your opponent controls. Once during each of your opponent's turns, you can activate 1 of the following effects:
â— When your opponent Normal Summons or Special Summons a monster, destroy it and inflict 800 damage to your opponent.
